name: Pin Shoot
description:
Hello!

I proudly present my first officially relased game - Pin Shoot! Still in development tho.

The game is only for Android devices, but don't worry! I will relase other versions, probably iOS and PC. Just need to do seme tweaks here and there ;) This is my hobby project and I'm not working in game busines. I plan few simple games in this graphic theme (up next Bursting Bubbles!). 

If you want, you can support me! I will apriciate!
